text_block_list.text:
On the day of the URA award ceremony, I was patiently waiting for 
the live broadcast to see Sensei's honor stand.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Bam bam baam! Trainer-san are you here!?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Oh, there you are! Is now a good time. I wanted to consult you 
about the Derby exhibition.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
It is about the materials to be exhibited, I mean…. Overall, I 
want to make it easier for others to understand our seniors.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
If it stays as it is now, You know, I want that to everyone who 
is watching the lined up materials to think, “I'm Impressed～～” 
that kind of feeling.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
I'm starting to wonder if there is a good way, 
but I'm not good at thinking…. haha.

Then, Tickezou why don't you explain 
it from the point of your feelings?

Then, Tickezou why don't you explain 
it from the point of your feelings?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: From feelings point….?

Look, when Tickezou talks about the Derby. This 
Horse Girl thought something like this, that 
is what you usually talk about, right?

Look, when Tickezou talks about the Derby. This 
Horse Girl thought something like this, that 
is what you usually talk about, right?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Oh, I see! I should push more drama into it. Like what is the 
difference between the two!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Then I have the materials I compiled myself, and that way I might 
be able to do it! Yosh, let's do our best to make the materials～!

It was when Winning Ticket started to work on the exhibition, but 
the time of “Live Broadcast” was drawing near.

Before that, I'd like to watch TV for a while, my former Trainer 
will be at the URA awards ceremony.

Before that, I'd like to watch TV for a while, my former Trainer 
will be at the URA awards ceremony.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Oh, it was about Oguri-san's Trainer, right! Then, I'll watch it 
with you! It might make a good story.

After turning on the TV for a while, the 
broadcast of the awards ceremony began.

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text:
“Congratulations on the URA Award this time” Were there any races 
that have left an impression in your long racing career?

text_block_list.name: Chief Trainer
text_block_list.text:
Oh, every race has the thoughts of multiple Horse Girls, so in 
that sense, all of them leave quite an impression.

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text:
It was an award in honor of your achievements so far, How did you 
feel when you heard that?

text_block_list.name: Chief Trainer
text_block_list.text:
I was of course happy, but I also thought if it was really okay 
for me to receive such an award.

text_block_list.name: Chief Trainer
text_block_list.text:
“Not every Horse Girl's dreams comes true. When it comes to the 
Derby, no one has ever won under me”.

text_block_list.name: Chief Trainer
text_block_list.text:
After all, as a person involved in the race, a victory In the 
Derby is said to be the highest glory….

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Eh…. Oh. They have never won the Derby….

he continued to be a Trainer for many years, Even the Sensei who 
won a lot of big titles, he didn't manage to win the Derby.

Even though it is the pinnacle of the race, even the 
Sensei who is said to be a veteran Trainer, the Derby 
is not something that can be easily won.

Even though it is the pinnacle of the race, even the 
Sensei who is said to be a veteran Trainer, the Derby 
is not something that can be easily won.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: The Derby is the first big race to be born in the Twinkle Series.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Everyone is aiming for the victory, working so hard, and the 
drama of such people accumulated a lot to this day.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Everyone is serious, really serious! So, whether you're a veteran 
Trainer or a powerful Horse Girl, It's very hard to win.

The fact that even Sensei couldn't bear 
the victory, convinced Winning Ticket.

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text:
There was a racer that was ranked No. 
1 favorites and still could not win.

text_block_list.name: Chief Trainer
text_block_list.text:
At her time, we were training until the anticipated day with 
victory in mind. Even so, in the last straight line….

text_block_list.name: Chief Trainer
text_block_list.text:
I was told that if it was tomorrow, I would have 
done this, to be like this instead, I thought about 
that for her who ran devoting her life.

text_block_list.name: Chief Trainer
text_block_list.text:
Instead of “Looking Back”, to forget about her thoughts on the 
Derby, We started thinking about the next step.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
…Ah, this is about the first Derby I've seen! I was watching it 
at the racetrack where my mom took me!
You mean the Derby the Sensei could not win…?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Yeah, without a doubt! It was a really amazing race!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Even though she was the number 1 favorite, she was being pulled 
out more and more. She was still thinking seriously about 
winning, she didn't give up until the end!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
I was wondering how precious the Derby is. That is when I saw it 
and understood it, that's why I admire it.

It was also a Derby where Sensei and the Horse Girl in charge put 
their thoughts and feelings on.

text_block_list.name: Chief Trainer
text_block_list.text:
“I did retire without winning in the end…” But right now, there 
is a guy in the current team <Sirius> who inherited my feelings”.

text_block_list.name: Chief Trainer
text_block_list.text: I believe he will win the Derby.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Hey, this is about you Trainer. You can win the Derby!?
Oh, Yeah….
Oh, Yeah….

I felt like Sensei on the other side of the TV looked at me. Like 
a dream…. As if to say, “You can do it”.

I felt like Sensei on the other side of the TV looked at me. Like 
a dream…. As if to say, “You can do it”.
Sensei entrusted me with his dreams. He trusted me….
Sensei entrusted me with his dreams. He trusted me….

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Eh!? so, Trainer-san you are aiming for the Derby!?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Waaaa～～!! It's a drama～!! The disciple is aiming for a dream that 
the master could not fulfill!

It seems that it is not a mistake that it 
is a drama as Winning Ticket is saying.

I was asked to help with the exhibition at this time and met with 
Winning Ticket aiming for the Derbyー

And at this time Winning Ticket came to the Trainer's room, and 
heard Sensei's story together with me, everything was leafyー

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
The announcer also had a nice interview! It's so touching to be 
able to hear the story of a Derby like this～!
Maybe it was fate. It felt like this
choice_data_list: Hey, do you want to aim for it together?
Hey, do you want to aim for it together?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Eh….? Together you say….

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Per, Perhaps… you mean Derby!? T, To, together with me!?
Yeah, Tickezou wants to win the Derby, right?
Yeah, Tickezou wants to win the Derby, right?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Of course! I want to win! it is my dream! From when I was little.
Me too right now, I also want to win.
Me too right now, I also want to win.
So if Tickezou is good with it, why don't we aim for it together?
So if Tickezou is good with it, why don't we aim for it together?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Re, really? Are you okay with me…?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Waaa…. Waaaaaa～～～～!!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
I did it～～! I got scouted! Let's aim for it together 
Trainer-san!! Let's go to the Derby!!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Tehehe! Trainer-san, I will give you the 
title of “Derby Trainer” as a present.
Then, I will present the title of “Derby Horse Girl” to Tickezou.
Then, I will present the title of “Derby Horse Girl” to Tickezou.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Yeah!! Let's both do our best!! Yosh～～! Aim towards the Derby!!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Winning Ticket here! Nice to meet your acquaintance!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Oho, at last the good stuff came in!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: I've heard about you Ticket-san. You're aiming to win the Derby

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Derby is a favorite of many Horse Girls. There will be many 
rivals, but, let's do our best toward that dream.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Thank you! I promise to deliver the 
Derby victory to team <Sirius>!

Tickezou to win the Derby you need strength of mind. Let's try to 
boost your dreams with team!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Oho! I'm impressed!! Let's go running newbie, towards that sun!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Yeah! Let's go…. Der～～ By～～!!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: It's a good feeling! isn't it! Okay, me too! Der～～ By～～!!

In this way, the curtains opened for Winning Ticket and the drama 
aiming to win the Derby.
